body:
So today i just read that one way servers can get money for running the server is... letting players pay to get in. so i was wondering 2 things (ik I'm late on this kinda stuff ok?)
1. Will Avicus be doing this?
2. Will donors be able to get the money back for the ranks? 
 Hope Someone will answer please thanks :D
P.S i just put it here cuz i feel thats the best spot for it. staff please move it somewhere else if needed thanks!
    -DasBlues

title: Paying To get in?

replies.body:
I highly doubt that donors will be able to get their money back. I also don't see a reason why Avicus would make it so you need to pay to play since they would lose a lot of players. 

This is just what I think tho.
replies.body_tagged:
I highly doubt that donors will be able to get their money back. I also don't see a reason why Avicus would make it so you need to pay to play since they would lose a lot of players. 

This is just what I think tho.

replies.body: We currently have not decided what we will do for finance after July, but the high staff will have a meeting in the near future as to what we are going to do. However, paying for access, I can guarantee will not be one of the ways.
replies.body_tagged: We currently have not decided what we will do for finance after July, but the high staff will have a meeting in the near future as to what we are going to do. However, paying for access, I can guarantee will not be one of the ways.

replies.body: I don't want my money back, #Gold!!
replies.body_tagged: I don't want my money back, #Gold!!
